name: merge
description: Merge multiple objects into one, optionally creating a new cloned object. Similar to the jQuery.extend but more flexible. Works in Node.js and the browser.

1.0.0.name: merge
1.0.0.description: NodeJS Merge is used to merge multiple objects into one object.

1.1.0.name: merge
1.1.0.description: JavaScript/NodeJS Merge is a tool to merge multiple objects into one object, with the possibility of create a new object cloned. His operation is very similar to the jQuery.extend function but more flexible.
